Question
========
  
In an educational study, boys and girls are randomly assigned to one of two teaching methods for arithmetic. At the beginning and end of the teaching period, arithmetic skills are measured by a test. Which method is most appropriate to investigate which teaching method is best? 
Answerlist
----------
* ANOVA with one 'within' factor.
* ANCOVA.
* ANOVA with one 'between' factor.
* ANOVA with two 'between' factors.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
